import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { todasTransacciones, verTransaccion } from '../funciones/funciones' const Trades = () => { const [trades, setTrades] = useState(null) const params = useParams() const [detalleTrade, setdetalleTrade] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { verTransaccion(trades, setdetalleTrade) }, []) useEffect(() => { todasTransacciones(params.market_id, setTrades) }, []) const now = new Date() const utcMiliSegundos = now.getTime() + (now.getTimezoneOffset() * 60 * 1000) const utcSegundos = Math.round(utcMiliSegundos / 1000) const timestamp = utcSegundos - 60 * 60 * 24 return( <>

Trades: {params.market_id}

Detalle: {detalleTrade}

{/* {verTransaccion != null ? (
{verTransaccion.map(trade => ( ))}
Timestamp Valor Precio Direcci√≥n

{trade[0]}

{trade[1]}

{trade[2]}

{trade[3]}

) : (

No hay transacciones disponibles

)} */} Volver al inicio ) } export default Trades
